text: Is a Home Health Aide needed for this patient?

responses.text: Yes, a Home Health Aide is ordered
Yes, a Home Health Aide is recommended; pending physician orders
No, a Home Health Aide is not needed

text: Which of the following service categories should be provided by a Home Health Aide for this patient?

responses.text: SAFETY AND PERTINENT INFORMATION MONITORING SERVICES
